text: LGU may refer to: * Ladies' Golf Union, UK * Lahore Garrison University, Punjab, Pakistan * Land-grant university, a type of university in the United States * Lebanese German University, Jounieh * Logan-Cache Airport, Utah, US, IATA code * Former London Guildhall University, UK * Leningrad State University, Ленинградский государственный университет (Лгу)/Leningradsky gosudarstvenny universitet (LGU) * Local government unit
title: LGU
